ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger triple sec liqueur
2 fluid ounces lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "Very fresh and tasty alcoholic drink with an peachy-orange twist! Watch out and be sure to sip slowly - not for the faint-hearted!!!"
ins: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour in the gin, triple sec, peach schnapps and orange juice. Fill the glass with lemon-lime soda and finish with a dash of grenadine. Stir and serve.
